title: 1436 Ivanhoe St - Denver - Finished Basement
posting_body: ['Text', 'show contact info', 'to setup a showing!', 'Virtual tour: 1436 Ivanhoe Street', 'AREA: Denver - Mayfair Neighborhood', 'FEATURES:', 'Great location!', 'Five-minute walk to both King Soopers and Safeway.', 'Close to many neighborhood restaurants!', 'INCLUDED UTILITIES:', 'Water, sewer, trash removal and weekly lawn mowing/yard maintenance every Monday (Tuesday if Monday is a holdiay)!', 'TENANT PAID UTILITIES:', 'All other utilities are paid by the tenant.', 'BEDROOMS & BATHROOMS: Four bedrooms, two full bathrooms.', 'Both bathrooms have a walk-in shower.', 'KITCHEN APPLIANCES INCLUDED: Refrigerator, stove, dishwasher, garbage disposal, microwave.', 'LAUNDRY: Washer and dryer.', 'FLOORING: Hardwood flooring in living room, dining room and upstairs bathrooms.', 'Tile in upstairs bathroom and kitchen.', 'Vinyl plank flooring in the rest of the unit.', 'HEAT/COOLING: Central heat and AC.', 'PARKING:One car parking garage in addition to long driveway.', 'Street parking also available.', 'FENCING: Fully fenced backyard.', 'BASEMENT: Finished basement has two bedrooms and one bathroom in addition to a family room.', '~913 sq ft.', 'RESTRICTIONS:', '**No more than 3 unrelated persons may lease the premises.', '**', '*1 Dog Max* Pets are considered with a one-time non-refundable pet fee of $250 per pet.', 'Sorry, but we cannot allow any of the following breeds of dog: American Pit Bull Terrier, American Staffordshire Terrier, and Staffordshire Bull Terrier.', 'SECURITY DEPOSIT:', "Security deposit is equal to one month's rent.", 'APPLICATION FEE: $30 per adult.', 'Please note we have a 700 minimum credit score for all properties.', 'AVAILABILITY DATE:', 'Today', "**Applicants must be able to start a lease within 1 week of the property's listed availability date.", '**', 'LEASE TERM: Initial lease to end April through June of 2023 with 12-month extensions possible at that time.', 'Growing marijuana inside or outside the premises is not allowed, smoking of any kind inside the property is not allowed.', 'Minimum 700 credit score required.']
